title: Regulation (EEC) No 1215/71 of the Commission of 10 June 1971 on detailed rules concerning the outline provisions for contracts for the sale of flax and hemp straw
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 1215/71 OF THE COMMISSION  of 10 June 1971  on detailed rules concerning the outline provisions for contracts for the sale of flax and hemp straw
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 August 1971.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 June 1971.
For the Commission
The President
Franco M. MALFATTI  (1)OJ No L 146, 4.7.1970, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 72, 26.3.1971, p. 4.
